name: Chloe (Hiro_Khai)
description:
Heya! This is a short playable prototype for a game that I made for a school project! This is a very short showcase game that was created to represent me as a creator. Sorry if it is buggy as it is my first game that I am proud enough to upload. Thank you for visiting this page and be sure to check out the game if you have a minute!

This game also features an interaction feature with objects in the world. In this game, you are also able to interact with objects multiple times yielding different dialogue.

Sprites, animation, and coding all done by me (proudly).
